00014 Component* SimpleRenderableCreator::createComponent(const string& name)
00015 {
00016     SimpleRenderable* ret = new SimpleRenderable(name);
00017     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(ret);
00018     return ret;
00019 }
00020 
00021 Component* SimpleRenderableCreator::copyComponent(const string& name, Component* com)
00022 {
00023     SimpleRenderable* renderable = static_cast<SimpleRenderable*>(com);
00024 
00025     SimpleRenderable* copy = new SimpleRenderable(name);
00026     float u, v, width, height;
00027     u = v = width = height = 0;
00028     renderable->getTextureCoords(&u, &v, &width, &height);
00029     copy->setTexture(renderable->getTexture(), u, v, width, height);
00030     copy->setBlendMode(renderable->getBlendMode());
00031     copy->setColor(renderable->getColor());
00032 
00033     SceneManager::get()->registerRenderableListener(copy);
00034 
00035     return copy;
00036 }
